recipe.name: Oatmeal Cookies
recipe.notes: This recipe was the scene of no small amount of controversy in my house for many years and it a rather poor transcription of a man's recipe and legacy.  Problem is that the cookie recipe is "as it is on the back of the box", along with these other ingredients.Maybe this is so, but I've got a secret suspicion you'll find a more accurate representation of this recipe around here someplace else.
recipe.preparation: Mix together all ingredients except the pecans.  Drop standard-sized cookies on a covered sheet tray and top each with a 1/2 pecan.  Bake 13 minutes, or maybe 19 -- horrible writing at the bottom.
